dt: {bc}to throw with a quick, light, or careless motion or with a sudden jerk
{bc}to fling or lift with a sudden motion
{bc}to tilt suddenly so as to empty by drinking
{bc}to fling or heave continuously about, to and fro, or up and down
{bc}to mix lightly until well coated with a dressing or until the elements are thoroughly combined
{bc}to accomplish, provide, or produce readily or easily
often used in the phrase {phrase}toss one's cookies{/phrase}
{bc}to move with a quick or spirited gesture
{bc}to decide an issue by flipping a coin

pt: {sc}throw{/sc} {sc}cast{/sc} {sc}toss{/sc} {sc}fling{/sc} {sc}hurl{/sc} {sc}pitch{/sc} {sc}sling{/sc} mean to cause to move swiftly through space by a propulsive movement or a propelling force. {sc}throw{/sc} is general and interchangeable with the other terms but may specifically imply a distinctive motion with bent arm.

pt.t: can {it}throw{/it} a fastball and a curve

pt: {sc}cast{/sc} usually implies lightness in the thing thrown and sometimes a scattering.
{sc}toss{/sc} suggests a light or careless or aimless throwing and may imply an upward motion.

pt.t: {it}flung{/it} the ring back in his face

pt: {sc}hurl{/sc} implies power as in throwing a massive weight.
{sc}pitch{/sc} suggests throwing carefully at a target.
{sc}sling{/sc} stresses either the use of whirling momentum in throwing or directness of aim.

shortdef: to throw with a quick, light, or careless motion or with a sudden jerk
to throw up in the air

dt.t: He {it}tossed back{/it} a shot of whiskey.

dt: {bc}to add (something) to what one is selling without asking for more money

dt.t: I'll even {it}toss in{/it} an upgrade for free.

shortdef: to add (something) to what one is selling without asking for more money

dt: {bc}to produce (something) quickly and without much effort

dt.t: He {it}tossed off{/it} a few lines of poetry.
He {it}tossed off{/it} a shot of whiskey.

dt: {bc}to touch or rub one's own sexual organs for sexual pleasure {bc}to masturbate

shortdef: to produce (something) quickly and without much effort
to touch or rub one's own sexual organs for sexual pleasure : to masturbate

dt: {bc}to put (something that is no longer useful or wanted) in a trash can, garbage can, etc. {bc}to throw (something) out

dt.t: It's time to {it}toss out{/it} those bananas.
His testimony was {it}tossed out{/it} by the judge.

dt: {bc}to mention (something) as a possible thing to be done, thought about, etc. {bc}to suggest

dt.t: She {it}tossed out{/it} a couple of ideas for improving the company's website.
They {it}tossed{/it} him {it}out{/it} of the bar after he started a fight.

shortdef: to put (something that is no longer useful or wanted) in a trash can, garbage can, etc. : to throw (something) out
to refuse to accept or consider (something)
to mention (something) as a possible thing to be done, thought about, etc. : to suggest
